data.title: Jeremiah Paul Ostriker
data.meta_description: “Jerry” Ostriker, a native of New York City, earned his bachelor’s degree in physics and chemistry at Harvard University and his Ph.D. in astrophysics at the University of Chicago, where he was a student of S. Chandrasekhar. After a post-doctoral year at the University of Cambridge he joined the faculty at Princeton University in 1965. There he served as chairman of the
data.meta_site_name: Department of Physics & Astronomy at Sonoma State University
